about_us_text: On HiMate.org refugees find free tickets and vouchers for events, goods and services to support the start of their new life in Europe. Items and services include: cinema tickets, concert tickets, tickets for sport events or free German courses.
approve_new_vouchers: We'll approve your new vouchers within 72 hours.
approve_updated_vouchers: We'll approve your update within 72 hours.
categories_info_text: All voucher categories of HiMate.org. Create new categories here.
conditions_content:
1) You can only reserve one voucher at a time for 72h maximum.

2) You need to be a registered refugee with documents that prove this.

3) You get only what is described in the voucher, nothing more, nothing less. The donor is not obliged to provide the goods he offered.

4) We would happy if you shared a photo of your experience on Facebook or Twitter using #HiMate.
email_expired_content: Your voucher reservation is expired. Vouchers can be reserved only for 72h.
email_forgot_password_text: To reset you password, click on the button below and complete process in our app.
email_registration_welcometext: Welcome to HiMate.org! Klick the button to finish registration.
email_reserve_content: "__voucher__" We would happy if you shared a photo of your experience on Facebook or Twitter using #HiMate
error_no_customer: This is not a refugee account
merchants_how_it_works_text: In the HiMate.org Merchant Web-App you can create and edit tickets and vouchers and see reservations for offers that are currently running.
not_authorized: You are not authorized for this action.
not-authorized: You are not authorized for this action.
privacy_text: HiMate respects you privacy, we only use data that are needed for making our services work.
redeem_voucher_notice:
1. Check valid documents

2. Plese enter the code provided by the refugee
reserve_notice:
You need to redeem this voucher within 72 hours. It expires afterwards.

The voucher code can be found via the menu of this app. You will receive an email with the voucher code to the specified address
__email__

Please make sure to bring your documents that prove your status as a refugee!
reserve_unregistered_notice:
You need an account to reserve a voucher!

Please login or create a new account!
title: Title
users_edit_info_text:
To set a new password, enter it in plain text. Leave blank otherwise. 

If you set a new password, the user will be logged off immediately.
users_info_text: All user accounts of HiMate.org. Create new users here.
verify_refugee_text: Please verify the refugee by means of any official document that proofs his/her status as refugee.
voucher_offline: Your voucher will be offline until verified!

WELCOME to HiMate! - the ticket platform for refugees!

مرحباً بك في تطبيق هاي مايت : `مرحبا يا رفيق`
